ygData.subject: Re: Farewell Cybertron
ygData.msgSnippet: Hoist stopped his work, and motioned to the Technobots to follow as well. Oh great. He whispered. And we have to share a ship with that megalomaniac

Hoist stopped his work, and motioned to the Technobots to follow as
well. "Oh great." He whispered. "And we have to share a ship with that
megalomaniac machine." He said. "A planet isnt enough room for him and
me." 

Strafe careened out of the air, and gracefully transformed, doing a
double front flip, landing on his feet, and was soon joined by
LIghtspeed, who screeched to a stop, then used the forward momentum, to
easily transform upwards, and take a step forward. "As much as I am
inclined to agree with you objective statement Hoist, Grimlock and the
Dinobots vigor, and impetus to win are a necessary addition to our
battalion. As well as them being the brute force of our group, they also
have a 350 some odd experience edge on the rest of the Autobots, save a
few." he said, and Strafe concured, "UN HUH"
